alert.note: Alert for Chattahoochee; Muscogee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Muscogee and western Chattahoochee Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 445 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Sand Hill, or near Columbus, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, heavy rain, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, North Fort Benning, Fort Benning/lawson Army Air Fld, Saint Marys Hills, Edgewood, Highland Park, Sand Hill, Battle Park, Vista Terrace, Columbus Metropolitan Airport, Kenwood, Custer Road Terrace, Benning Hills, Avondale, Benning Park and Carter Acres. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
